Prepared By: {{frappe.db.get_value("User", doc.owner, "full_name")}}
Verified By:{{frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.verified_by,"employee_name")}} ({{frappe.db.get_value("Employee",doc.verified_by,"designation")}})
